group_works.title: Advanced panel beating and paint work

results.title: Specialist panel work
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Panel & paint”.
Provides instructions in advanced panel beating. Lessons include, lead wiping, metal finishing, shrinking, welding and rust removal.

group_siblings.title: Advanced panel beating and paint work

results.title: Advanced panel beating and paint work
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Panel & paint”.
Provides instructions for the serious amateur panel beater. Demonstrates advanced techniques beyond basic repairs including correct methods for replacing door skins and quarter panels and windscreen fitting. Outlines two pack paint application discussing mixing, spray equipment and safety concerns. Features John Llewellyn.

results.title: Panel beating and paint work
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Panel & paint”.
Provides instructions for the serious amateur panel beater. Introduces the essential tools, rust treatment, paint preparation and minor body repairs. Professional advice and demonstrations are given, leading step by step to the perfect job.

results.title: Destinos: an introduction to Spanish
results.brief_description: A series of introductory Spanish language programmes, in the form of a long-running mystery drama about Don Fernando and the secrets of his past. Learn Spanish while the mystery takes you all over the Spanish speaking world. Each programme is structured carefully so that three kinds of Spanish are used. Conversational Spanish, which is spoken by the characters in the drama. The narrator’s Spanish, and the Spanish spoken by the instructor, Raquel, who breaks in periodically during the episode to explain and re-inforce particular language structures and grammar. In this series, you will learn about the Spanish speaking world, its culture, life and customs.

results.title: Warren Beatty
results.creator_credit: Ray Atherton and Passport International Entertainment
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hollywood remembers”.
Warren Beatty’s reputation as a great romantic figure both on and off the screen has enthralled audiences throughout his career. Using rare film clips, production stills and coming attraction trailers this video provides an insight into his performances as an actor and his efforts as a producer and director. Also presents information about his personal life highlighting his more famous romantic encounters.

results.title: Robert Redford
results.creator_credit: Ray Atherton and Passport International Entertainment
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hollywood remembers”.
Robert Redford has enjoyed a successful career spanning decades as an actor, producer and director. Using rare production stills, coming attraction trailers and behind the scenes footage, this informative video provides an historical account of his screen career and an insight into his personal life.

results.title: Clint Eastwood
results.creator_credit: Ray Atherton and Passport International Entertainment
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hollywood remembers”.
Speak softly and carry a big gun…that’s the attitude that has made Clint Eastwood one of the biggest box office stars! And this video looks at his entire film career, from the early “Spaghetti Westerns”made in Italy to his Hollywood superstar years with “Dirty Harry” and beyond. Featured are rare film clips, original coming attractions, previews, and more, including footage never released to television. It’s a treasure trove featuring Eastwood’s best work, and the first serious retrospective of his lengthy acting career. Whether you’re an Eastwood fan, a film buff, or an action-adventure afficionado, this is a video you’ll want to watch over and over again.

results.title: Paul Newman
results.creator_credit: Ray Atherton and Passport International Entertainment
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hollywood remembers”.
His films have won acclaim throughout the world and his star continues to shine brightly, undimmed by the many years since his first film appearance. The film career of Paul Newman is the stuff dreams are made of. Clips from some of Newman’s greatest films are featured as well as rare home movie footage of the actor relaxing at home, meeting his public and working on the set. This informative and fascinating program brings the viewer deep into the inner world of this brilliant and enigmatic artist. Contains some b & w sequences.
